00035 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00041 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS ***********************/
00042 /* Vector Table Offset */
00043 #define VTOR_OFFSET             0x20080000
00044 
00045 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00046 uint8_t menu[]=
00047         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00048         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00049         "Privileged demo \n\r"
00050         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00051         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00052         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00053         "This example used to test NVIC Vector Table Relocation function\n\r"
00054         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00055 FunctionalState Cur_State = DISABLE;
00056 
00057 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00058 
00059 void SysTick_Handler(void);
00060 void print_menu(void);
00061 
00062 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00063 /*********************************************************************/
00068 void SysTick_Handler(void)
00069 {
00070         //Clear System Tick counter flag
00071         SYSTICK_ClearCounterFlag();
00072         //toggle P0.0
00073         if (Cur_State == ENABLE)
00074         {
00075                 //pull-down pin
00076                 GPIO_ClearValue(1, (1<<28));
00077                 Cur_State = DISABLE;
00078         }
00079         else
00080         {
00081                 GPIO_SetValue(1, (1<<28));
00082                 Cur_State = ENABLE;
00083         }
00084 }
00085 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00086 /*********************************************************************/
00091 void print_menu(void)
00092 {
00093         _DBG(menu);
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00097 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00098 /*********************************************************************/
00103 int c_entry (void)
00104 {
00105         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00106          * – 115200bps
00107          * – 8 data bit
00108          * – No parity
00109          * – 1 stop bit
00110          * – No flow control
00111          */
00112         debug_frmwrk_init();
00113 
00114         // print welcome screen
00115         print_menu();
00116 
00117         //Use P0.0 to test System Tick interrupt
00118         GPIO_SetDir(1, (1<<28), 1); //Set P0.0 as output
00119 
00120         _DBG("Remapping Vector Table at address: ");
00121         _DBH32(VTOR_OFFSET); _DBG_("");
00122         NVIC_SetVTOR(VTOR_OFFSET);
00123 
00124         /* Copy Vector Table from 0x00000000 to new address
00125          * In ROM mode: Vector Interrupt Table is initialized at 0x00000000
00126          * In RAM mode: Vector Interrupt Table is initialized at 0x10000000
00127          * Aligned: 256 words
00128          */
00129 
00130 #if(__RAM_MODE__==0)//Run in ROM mode
00131         memcpy(VTOR_OFFSET, 0x00000000, 256*4);
00132 #else
00133         memcpy(VTOR_OFFSET, 0x10000000, 256*4);
00134 #endif
00135 
00136         _DBG_("If Vector Table remapping is successful, LED P1.28 will blink by using SysTick interrupt");
00137         //Initialize System Tick with 100ms time interval
00138         SYSTICK_InternalInit(100);
00139         //Enable System Tick interrupt
00140         SYSTICK_IntCmd(ENABLE);
00141         //Enable System Tick Counter
00142         SYSTICK_Cmd(ENABLE);
00143 
00144         while(1);
00145         return 1;
00146 }
00147 
00148 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00149  allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00150  heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00151  toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00152  file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00153 int main(void) {
00154         return c_entry();
00155 }
